hadiths.text: Abu Wa'il reported:I was sitting with Abu Musa and 'Abdullah and they were conversing with each other and Abu Musa reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying (that we find in the above-mentioned ahadith)

chapter.ara-name: باب رَفْعِ الْعِلْمِ وَقَبْضِهِ وَظُهُورِ الْجَهْلِ وَالْفِتَنِ فِي آخِرِ الزَّمَانِ
chapter.eng-name: The Taking Away Of Knowledge And The Spread Of Ignorance At The End Of Time
